title: MACP Citations Schema
description: Schema for the citations.json file in the MACP protocol.

citation_id.description: Unique identifier for the citation record.

paper_id.description: The ID of the paper being cited.

cited_in.description: The project, document, or context where the citation is used.

cited_by_agent.description: The ID of the agent who made the citation.

handoff_id.description: The handoff ID related to this citation action.

date.description: The date the citation was made (YYYY-MM-DD).

context.description: The specific context or reason for the citation.
